properties.body:
MEDITERRANEAN SEA.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED FROM VESSEL, SEVEN
PERSONS ON BOARD, VICINITY TUNISIA TO ITALY.
VESSELS IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP
LOOKOUT, ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO
MRCC ROME, INMARSAT-C: 424744220,
PHONE: 39 065 908 4527, 39 065 908 4409,
FAX: 39 06 592 2737, 39 065 908 4793,
E-MAIL: ITMRCC@MIT.GOV.IT.
